```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
db <- available.packages(repos = BiocManager::repositories())

for (pkgs in c("csoneson/dreval", "csoneson/ExploreModelMatrix",
               "fmicompbio/eisaR", "iSEE/iSEEu", "csoneson/jcc")) {
  my <- read.dcf(url(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/",
                            pkgs, "/master/DESCRIPTION")))
  db <- rbind(db, my[, match(colnames(db), colnames(my))])
  rownames(db)[nrow(db)] <- strsplit(pkgs, "/")[[1]][2]
}
```
